name: Space Emergency
overview: You are on a mission. A secret inter-galactic mission to gather parts from the alien propulsion labs. These are vital parts, and if you are successful you could prevent a major galactic skirmish, a confrontation of epic proportions. You have reached a critical point, and the enraged Venutian guardsmen are on the alert - indeed they are right behind you, and the walls are electrified - if you touch them, you will be disintegrated instantly.
